text.div:
Example Diagnosis Related Group Codes

This value set includes example Diagnosis Related Group codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/ex-diagnosisrelatedgroup defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
100 Normal Vaginal DeliveryNormal Vaginal Delivery.
101 Appendectomy - uncomplicatedAppendectomy without rupture or other complications.
300 Tooth abcessEmergency department treatment of a tooth abcess.
